message.content:
{"id": "116786", 
 "title": "Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path", 
 "description": "", 
 "OB": "When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer is currently storing the absolute path. It should instead save the relative path.", 
 "EB": "Bug 116786: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path instead of the absolute path. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test, the relative path should be used.", 
 "SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '116786', 'title': 'Bug 116786Library include should store relative path.', 'description': '', 'OB': 'i see that hte report design stores absolute path, we need to save relativepath.<propertyname="fileName"/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property<property name="namespace"lib1</property ', 'EB': 'Bug 116786Library include should store relative path. When a library included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generatethe relative path, and save relative path.Example $project/test contains my report design. ', 'SR': ''}
